an6.16:2.5: sakkhissati → na sakkhissati (s1-3, km) | sakkoti (pts1, mr), santharitun’ti → saṇṭharitunti (s1-3) | santharitunti (pts1) | sandharitunti (mr)
an6.16:3.4: yaṃ no → yadā no (bj) | yadā te (si) | yathā (s1-3) | yathā no (pts1), samāciṇṇaṃ → samādinnaṃ (bj)
an6.16:6.2: nakulamātā gahapatānī lābhinī → nakulamātā gahapatānī na lābhinī (pts1)
